description: Hetzner Cloud Volumes plugin for Docker

env.name: apikey
env.description: authentication token to use when accessing the Hetzner Cloud API

env.name: location
env.description: location in which to create volumes

env.name: size
env.description: standard size of the created volume in GB

env.name: prefix
env.description: prefix to use when naming created volumes

env.name: fstype
env.description: filesystem type to be created on new volumes

mounts.description: used to access the dynamically attached block devices
mounts.name: dev
